William PSI Dilaporkan ke BK, Bagaimana Kode Etik DPRD Atur Kerahasiaan?
05 Nov 2019, 12:11 by Arief Ikhsanudin
Jakarta - Anggota DPRD DKI Jakarta dari Fraksi Partai Solidaritas Indonesia (PSI), William Aditya Sarana, dilaporkan kepada Badan Kehormatan (BK) DPRD karena dianggap melanggar kode etik. Alasannya dia mengunggah rencana anggaran pembelian Lem Aibon Rp 82,8 miliar yang masih pembahasan. Bagaimana aturannya dalam kode etik?
Kode etik di kepengurusan anggota Dewan periode 2019-2024 belum disahkan sehingga mereka masih menggunakan kode etik yang diatur dalam Keputusan DPRD DKI Jakarta Nomor 34 Tahun 2006 tentang Kode Etik DPRD DKI Jakarta.
Dalam kasus William, Ketua Badan Kehormatan DPRD DKI Jakarta Achmad Nawawi menyebut, ada pasal kerahasiaan yang diatur dalam kode etik. Soal kerahasiaan itu terdapat diatur dalam Pasal 15 yang tertulis:

Pasal 15

(1) Anggota DPRD tidak diperkenankan menyampaikan pemberitaan dan atau menyalahgunakan sesuatu yang sifatnya rahasia untuk kepentingan pribadi maupun kelompok.
(2) Anggota DPRD wajib menjaga rahasia yang dipercayakan kepadanya sampai batas waktu yang telah ditentukan atau sampai masalah tersebut sudah dinyatakan terbuka untuk umum.
Achmad belum bisa menyimpulkan apakah ada pelanggaran William karena Pemerintahan Provinsi DKI Jakarta tidak mengunggah dokumen rencana anggaran Kebijakan Umum Anggaran Prioritas Plafon Anggaran Sementara (KUA-PPAS) 2020 untuk publik.
"Ya, nanti tergantung (keputusan) rapat," ucap Achmad saat ditemui di ruangannya, gedung DPRD DKI Jakarta, Jalan Kebon Sirih, Jakarta Pusat, Selasa (5/11/2019).

William PSI Reported to BK, How Does the DPRD Code of Ethics Regulate Confidentiality?
05 Nov 2019, 12:11 by Arief Ikhsanudin
Jakarta - DKI Jakarta DPRD member from the Indonesian Solidarity Party (PSI) Faction, William Aditya Sarana, was reported to the DPRD Honorary Board (BK) for allegedly violating the code of ethics. The reason is that he uploaded a budget plan to buy a Rp. 82.8 billion Aibon Lem which is still under discussion. What are the rules in the code of ethics?
The code of ethics in the management of Council members for the 2019-2024 period has not yet been ratified, so they still use the code of ethics that is regulated in DKI Jakarta DPRD Decree Number 34 of 2006 concerning the DKI Jakarta DPRD Code of Ethics.
In the case of William, the Chairperson of the DKI Jakarta DPRD Honorary Board Achmad Nawawi said, there was a confidentiality article regulated in the code of ethics. The matter of confidentiality is regulated in Article 15 which is written:

Article 15

(1) DPRD members are not permitted to submit news and or misuse something that is confidential in nature for their personal or group interests.
(2) Members of the DPRD are required to keep the secret entrusted to them until a predetermined deadline or until the matter has been declared open to the public.
Achmad could not conclude whether there was a violation of William because the DKI Jakarta Provincial Government did not upload the budget plan document of the 2020 Provisional Budget Ceiling (KUA-PPAS) for the public.
"Yes, it will depend (on the decision) of the meeting," Achmad said when met in his room, DKI Jakarta DPRD building, Jalan Kebon Sirih, Central Jakarta, Tuesday (11/05/2019).
